message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $130. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it.
I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $115 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $122?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to go up to $120, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you meet me at $120?
